movies.title: Císarovy nové saty
movies.plot: The Emperor of a European country demands new clothes to wear every day, in fact sometimes several times a day. He imposes a heavy tax on the poor citizens to pay for his vanity. An itinerant man and boy come to the capital city and see the injustice, and make friends, but they soon have to flee. They return disguised as arab tailors, and offer to make the Emperor a new suit of clothes. But only the wise will be able to see it; fools, or those unfit for their public office, will not see anything. The Emperor orders the suit made, and much money is needed to purchase the raw materials. Eventually the suit is ready, and the Emperor and his officials pretend that they can see a wonderful outfit; will anyone prick the bubble of the illusion?
movies.simplePlot: Vain Emperor is shown up by a trick; he realises his folly and reforms.

biography.bio: Harald Juhnke was born on June 10, 1929 in Berlin-Charlottenburg, Germany as Harry Heinz Herbert Juhnke. He was an actor, known for Drei Damen vom Grill (1977), Der Trinker (1995) and Der Hauptmann von Köpenick (1997). He was married to Susanne Hsiao, Chariklia Baxevanos and Sybil Werden. He died on April 1, 2005 in Rüdersdorf bei Berlin, Brandenburg, Germany.
biography.name: Harald Juhnke

biography.bio: Andréa Ferréol was born on January 6, 1947 in Aix-en-Provence, France. She is an actress, known for Le dernier métro (1980), A Zed & Two Noughts (1985) and The Tin Drum (1979).
biography.name: Andréa Ferréol

biography.bio: Jan Preucil was born on February 17, 1937 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Stalingrad (1993), La fille de tes rêves (1998) and Beauty and the Beast (1978).
biography.name: Jan Preucil

biography.bio: Jan Kalous is an actor, known for Dedecek je lepsí nez pes (1989), Plivník (1991) and Císarovy nové saty (1994).
biography.name: Jan Kalous

biography.bio: Carsten Voigt is an actor, known for AVP: Alien vs. Predator (2004), U-571 (2000) and Valkyrie (2008).
biography.name: Carsten Voigt

biography.bio: Therese Herz was born on May 10, 1960 in Prague, Czechoslovakia as Terezie Pokorná. She is an actress and assistant director, known for Amadeus (1984), Die dumme Augustine (1993) and Galose stastia (1986).
biography.name: Therese Herz

biography.bio: Andrej Hryc was born on November 30, 1949 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Rivers of Babylon (1998), Uprising (2001) and Habermann (2010).
biography.name: Andrej Hryc

biography.bio: Juraj Herz was born on September 4, 1934 in Kezmarok, Czechoslovakia. He is a director and actor, known for L'incinérateur de cadavres (1969), Habermann (2010) and Beauty and the Beast (1978).
biography.name: Juraj Herz

biography.bio: Milos Nesvadba was born on April 17, 1925 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor and set decorator, known for Sto dukatu za Juana (1971), Muz mnoha tvárí (1958) and Tomorrow, People Will Be Dancing Everywhere (1952).
biography.name: Milos Nesvadba

biography.bio: Radek Kuchar was born on November 22, 1978 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Hart's War (2002), Perníková vez (2002) and Crash Road (2007).
biography.name: Radek Kuchar

biography.bio: Michaela Urbanová was born on February 4, 1980 in Most, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Die dumme Augustine (1993), Císarovy nové saty (1994) and Redakce (2004).
biography.name: Michaela Urbanová

biography.bio: Michal Matátko is an actor, known for Die dumme Augustine (1993) and Císarovy nové saty (1994).
biography.name: Michal Matátko

biography.bio: Annelie Herz is an actress, known for Passage (1997), Císarovy nové saty (1994) and Cerní andelé (2001).
biography.name: Annelie Herz

biography.placeOfBirth: Suchdol by Prague, Czechoslovakia [now Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Dana Hlavácová was born on June 20, 1945 in Suchdol by Prague, Czechoslovakia as Daniela Hlavácová. She is an actress, known for Three Wishes for Cinderella (1973), Krkonosské hromování (1971) and Popelka (1969).
biography.name: Dana Hlavácová

biography.bio: Rudolf Krátký was born on November 16, 1919 in Brno, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for Witchhammer (1970), Days of Betrayal (1973) and The Angel of Blissful Death (1966). He died on April 13, 2009 in Brno, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Rudolf Krátký
